title: Systems Thinking and Design: Context-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Mathematical Concepts (Functions, Graphs, Statistics) and Basic Engineering Problem Comprehension
context.additional_context: Process of Solving Local Sustainable Development Issues Through Mathematical Modeling and System Design, Featuring Collaborative Learning with Digital Tools (Geogebra, Python, Padlet, etc.)

learning_goals: Learners can structure real-world socio-technical problems into system architectures and design mathematical models
Learners can integrate multidisciplinary knowledge systems (environment, economy, engineering) to define problem-solving parameters
Learners demonstrate the ability to iteratively improve system design processes through formative assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
